title: Research data quality: single-word, very-long, binary-encoded
description: Analyze samples of single-word, very-long, binary-encoded. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (single-word): Extract 5+ samples of 'single-word' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (single-word): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (very-long): Extract 5+ samples of 'very-long' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (very-long): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (binary-encoded): Extract 5+ samples of 'binary-encoded' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (binary-encoded): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
